name: Google -  redesign v2
description:
I know, there are a lot of bugs and I'll try to fix them.

Last update: 2006-11-27
Now this style works with google.com, google.co.uk, google.ca and google.de. Also you can select your language in http://www.google.com/language_tools?hl=en
